title: DC/Finished Game
body: Hi, i recently finished a game, at the end of the game i clicked skip waiting for stats, and now it still says im in game? i cant connect to the game because its over, but cant start a new one? help please riot or somebody? :)

replies.body: The exact same thing is happening to me... It has been like this for a few hours now.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Everything is back to normal for me now. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
have a feeling the servers might be down because i cant even log in
Yeah it's weird my buddy and I are stuck in a phantom game and our previous match isn't showing on op.gg or the league client.
That happened to me after a hexakill game on Friday night!
I haven't been able to log in all day either!
same issue for me and a friend too - been like this for 3 hours

Well, i just thought i'd join to say....

RIOT HELP US MAN I'M STUCK IN THE SAME FKING GLITCH AS THESES GUYS!!! BEING IN BRONZE IS FRUSTRATING ENOUGH THEN HAVING THIS GLITCH,

thanks for reading see you in Bronze if you guys are there.
they are bugged i think or overloaded. if you log out, can you log back in?
If you log back in, it brings you back to the reconnect screen, it's been like this for around 2 hours now
I would say probably not as i haven't even been able to log on at all today!
Riot pls, literally my only ranked win in 5 days and this happens. D: I NEED MY LP RIOT
I have not even been able to log in today so something wrong with servers for sure!
